message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 40% and take 60% for myself. Let's see if you accept!
You're being generous with 40%, but I think I can do better. How about a 4:1 split in my favor?
You wanted a 4:1 split? I'll give you 3:1, but I'm not being generous. Take it or leave it!
You're not being generous at all! I'll take a smaller share, but I'm not going to accept a 3:1 split. How about a 9:1 split, and we can end this?
You're pushing for a 9:1 split? I'll give you 7:3, but don't expect any more generosity from me!
You're not budging, I see. I'll try to squeeze out a better deal for myself. How about I take 99% and you get 1%?
Enough is enough. Let's split it 50/50 and end this. I'm not going to let you take advantage of me anymore!
